Federal College of Education Abeokuta (FCEA), (nke a na -akpọbu Federal Advanced Teachers College ) bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọha enyere ikike inye akwụkwọ asambodo nke National Education (NCE) nye ụmụ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nke ọma
E hiwere ya na afọ 1976 na Osiele, Ogun State, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria
Rafiu Adekola Soyele bu godụ onye etinyere dịka onye isi oge nta.
Kọleji ahụ na -eme usoro igụ akwụkwọ ụzọ atọ: NCE, nzere a ana enweta site na mmekọrita Mahadum Ibadan na Mahadum Steeti Lagos, na PGDE
Ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum ahụ bụ mahadum izizi mbụ na steeti Ogun
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bidoro ịrụ ọrụ na afọ 1976,  n'otu ebe ya na Abeokuta Grammar School, tupu ọ kwaga ebe nke ya ahụ na adịgide adịgide na afọ 1978 na Osiele.
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na -enye ọtụtụ nkuzi n'okpuru ngalaba ndị a;
Ụlọ akwụkwọ a na -enyekwara ụmụ akwụkwọ aka inweta ahụmịhe na ngalaba ọmụmụ ha dị iche iche site na mmemme SIWES
